title: NEL service delayed due to signaling fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 因信号故障导致东北线服务延迟
title_translations.ms: Perkhidmatan NEL tertangguh kerana masalah isyarat
title_translations.ta: சிக்னல் கோளாறு காரணமாக NEL சேவை தாமதமானது

updates.text: 19/03, 6.07pm: NEL full svc has resumed. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
19/03, 5.58pm: NEL svc is delayed due to a Signaling fault at Harbourfront NE1. Additional travel time of abt 20 minutes may be expected.
